General.Name: Ye Chiu Metal Recycling China Ltd
General.Description: Yechiu Metal Recycling (China) Ltd. engages in aluminum alloy recycling business in Asia and the United States. The company produces and sells aluminum alloy ingots for use in automotive, power tool, telecommunication, hardware, and home appliance industries. It recycles all kinds of industrial and household waste, scrapped cars, and scrapped products. The company was formerly known as Ye Chiu Metal Taicang Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yechiu Metal Recycling (China) Ltd. in 2009. Yechiu Metal Recycling (China) Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taicang, China.
